alert.note: Alert for Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 11:46AM CST until further notice by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Des Arc affecting Prairie County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Des Arc. * WHEN...From Saturday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Many acres of farmland flooded within the levees. Water is backing up Bayou Des Arc and Cypress Bayou. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 20.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday evening, February 26, and continue rising to a crest of 24.5 feet Wednesday evening, March 2. Additional rises are possible. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecast 12 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Crest Time Date White River Des Arc 24.0 20.2 Wed 11 AM 22.0 23.2 23.9 24.5 6 PM 3/02 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
